Class TSP

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsp.TSP

  • public class TSP
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TSP(IGraph graph) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evolution()
      Creating a repeated process to find the best chromosome
      This process will stop if the expected chromosome is found or the process reaches to termination time
      boolean matingParents()
      Getting randomizely two chromosomes and scrossing them
      The fitness value of chromosomes in new generation are calculated
      And only the best ones are kept after they are ordered.
      void statistic()
      Display the duration of searching process
      Display the best chromosome found

    • Method Detail

      • evolution

        public void evolution()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creating a repeated process to find the best chromosome
        This process will stop if the expected chromosome is found or the process reaches to termination time
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Parameter#terminationTime
        , Parameter.mutationRange, Population#initialize()
        , Population#order()

      • matingParents

        public boolean matingParents()
        Getting randomizely two chromosomes and scrossing them
        The fitness value of chromosomes in new generation are calculated
        And only the best ones are kept after they are ordered.
        Returns:
        true of the expected value is found. Otherwise, returning false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Parameter#bestCostRate
        , Population#order()
        , Population#removeBadChromosomes()

      • statistic

        public void statistic()
        Display the duration of searching process
        Display the best chromosome found
